Laredo.XHTLN-FM: XHTLN-FM (branded as Imagen 94.1 and RMX Nuevo Laredo) is a Spanish Contemporary Music format FM radio station that serves the Laredo, Texas, United States and Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas, Mexico border area. XHTLN is owned by Grupo Imagen and airs Imagen Radio programs and the RMX music format. XHTLN broadcasts the Laredo Bucks home and away hockey games live.
